SELECT /* PossLendProductInfo.xml, searchPossLendProductInfo, SAC 전시, 2014-06-12 */ IA.* FROM ( SELECT A.PROD_ID AS POSS_PROD_ID ,C.PROD_NM AS POSS_PROD_NM ,E.PROD_AMT AS POSS_PROD_AMT ,B.CHAPTER
,B.BOOK_CLSF_CD
,F.PROD_ID AS LEND_PROD_ID ,H.PROD_NM AS LEND_PROD_NM ,J.PROD_AMT AS LEND_PROD_AMT ,L.USE_PERIOD_UNIT_CD ,L.USE_PERIOD ,L.USE_PERIOD_UNIT_CD AS DOWN_POSSIBLE_PERIOD_UNIT_CD ,L.USE_PERIOD AS DOWN_POSSIBLE_PERIOD ,(SELECT PROD_NM FROM TB_DP_PROD_RSHP Z1 ,TB_DP_PROD_DESC Z2 WHERE Z1.PROD_ID = Z2.PROD_ID AND Z1.PROD_RSHP_CD = 'DP010802' /* DP010802 : 채널-에피소드 상품 관계 */ AND Z2.LANG_CD = #{langCd} AND Z1.PART_PROD_ID = #{prodId} AND ROWNUM = 1 ) AS CHNL_PROD_NM /* 채널상품명 */ FROM TB_DP_PROD A /* 소장 상품 */
,TB_DP_EBOOK_PROD B /* 소장 상품 (이북코믹) */
,TB_DP_VOD_PROD B /* 소장 상품 (VOD) */
,TB_DP_PROD_DESC C /* 소장 상품 설명 */ ,TB_DP_TENANT_PROD D /* 소장 상품 */ ,TB_DP_TENANT_PROD_PRICE E /* 소장 상품 가격 */ ,TB_DP_PROD F /* 대여 상품 */
,TB_DP_EBOOK_PROD G /* 대여 상품 (이북코믹) */
,TB_DP_VOD_PROD G /* 대여 상품 (VOD) */
,TB_DP_PROD_DESC H /* 대여 상품 설명 */ ,TB_DP_TENANT_PROD I /* 대여 상품 */ ,TB_DP_TENANT_PROD_PRICE J /* 대여 상품 가격 */ ,TB_DP_USE_POLICY K ,TB_DP_USE_POLICY L WHERE A.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND A.PROD_ID = C.PROD_ID AND C.LANG_CD = #{langCd} AND A.PROD_ID = D.PROD_ID AND D.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND A.PROD_ID = E.PROD_ID AND E.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND SYSDATE BETWEEN E.APPLY_START_DT AND E.APPLY_END_DT AND A.CID = F.CID AND F.PROD_ID = G.PROD_ID AND F.PROD_ID = H.PROD_ID AND H.LANG_CD = #{langCd} AND F.PROD_ID = I.PROD_ID AND I.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND F.PROD_ID = J.PROD_ID AND A.USE_POLICY_ID = K.USE_POLICY_ID(+) AND F.USE_POLICY_ID = L.USE_POLICY_ID(+) AND J.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND SYSDATE BETWEEN J.APPLY_START_DT AND J.APPLY_END_DT ----------------------------------------------------------------- -- INPUT PARAMETER ----------------------------------------------------------------- AND K.POSS_LEND_CLSF_CD = 'DP010601' /* DP010601 : 소장 상품 */ AND D.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' /* PD000403 : 판매중 */ AND D.EXPO_YN = 'Y' /* Y : 노출 (노출여부) */ AND L.POSS_LEND_CLSF_CD = 'DP010602' /* DP010602 : 대여 상품 */ AND I.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' /* PD000403 : 판매중 */ AND I.EXPO_YN = 'Y' /* Y : 노출 (노출여부) */
AND A.PROD_ID = #{prodId}
AND F.PROD_ID = #{prodId}
ORDER BY A.PROD_ID DESC, F.PROD_ID DESC ) IA WHERE ROWNUM = 1
